overview: With this movie you are witnessing the awesome debut of the Brazilian sensation, Elle Rio, in a role only she can do justice to. Fresh from Brazil, she gets hired as a housemaid for a rich and raunchy American family. Once this household of horny relatives and friends get a load of her incredible charms, and her insatiable hunger to satisfy everybody's sexual whims, they become her willing slaves!
tagline: Presenting The Fiery Brazilian Hellcat: Elle Rio!
title: Rio Heat!
